xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: AdminGeneralSheet
xwikidoc.content: ### Administrate general wiki preferences, at global level #set($legend = ['language', 'editor', 'admin', 'smtp']) #set($params = $util.hashMap) #set($params.language = ['multilingual', 'languages' , 'default_language', 'dateformat']) #set($params.editor = ['editor', 'core.defaultDocumentSyntax', 'xwiki.title.mandatory']) #set($params.admin = ['admin_email']) #set($params.smtp = ['smtp_server', 'smtp_port', 'smtp_server_username', 'smtp_server_password', 'javamail_extra_props']) #includeForm('XWiki.AdminFieldsDisplaySheet')
